questions.question: What is the full name of Tadeusz Kościuszko?
What rank was Tadeusz Kościuszko given in the U.S. Army?
What did Tadeusz Kościuszko do to win more army volunteers from the peasant masses?
What battle is Tadeusz Kościuszko most famous for?
What did Tadeusz Kościuszko arm his peasant recruits with?
What did Tadeusz Kościuszko do to free his serfs?
What did Tadeusz Kościuszko do to gain the support of the Girondists and Jacobins?
answers: Pledged radical internal reforms in Poland and military diversion against Prussia and Austria
questions.correctAnswer: Pledged radical internal reforms in Poland and military diversion against Prussia and Austria

questions.question: What did Tadeusz Kościuszko do to free his black slaves?
answers: Appropriated some of his estate for setting them free and for educating them
questions.correctAnswer: Appropriated some of his estate for setting them free and for educating them
